content: until desired length 7 toe row 1 knit row 2 ssk k12 k2tog twice 28 sts remain row 3 ssk k10 k2tog twice 24 sts remain row 4 ssk k8 k2tog twice 20 sts remain row 5 ssk k6 k2tog twice 16 sts remain break yarn leaving a long tail place first 8 sts on one needle & last 8 sts on another needle kitchener remaining stitches weave in ends repeat all steps for second sock 4
